issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.
Windows file separators (`\`) and drive letter separators (':') must be escaped (`\\`) in property files; use C\\:\\\\Android
Use `SwitchCompat` from AppCompat or `SwitchMaterial` from Material library

This library supports using KSP instead of kapt, which greatly improves performance. Learn more: https://developer.android.com/studio/build/migrate-to-ksp
Prefer `mutableFloatStateOf` instead of `mutableStateOf`
Set `android:baselineAligned="false"` on this element for better performance
Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `@android:color/white` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@style/Theme.MrComic`)

Buttons in button bars should be borderless; use `style="?android:attr/buttonBarButtonStyle"` (and `?android:attr/buttonBarStyle` on the parent)
Buttons in button bars should be borderless; use `style="?android:attr/buttonBarButtonStyle"` (and `?android:attr/buttonBarStyle` on the parent)
Avoid using sizes smaller than `11sp`: `10sp`
Use the KTX extension function `Bitmap.scale` instead?
